lexUnit.name: step.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: lift and set down one's foot or one foot after the other in order to walk somewhere or move to a new position.

sentence.text: Step aboard in all your finery and you 'll barely need to incline your head , let alone disturb a vicuna pleat or crush the crinoline .
